name: PM Garib Kalyan Yojana
criteria: Free food grains and pulses for vulnerable families. Financial assistance to women through Jan Dhan Yojana accounts.
contact: Visit the official government website for program details and contact information.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
criteria: Financial inclusion through the opening of bank accounts. Direct money transfer to beneficiary accounts during COVID-19.
contact: Contact your nearest bank or visit the official Jan Dhan Yojana website for details.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
criteria: Income support for farmers. Direct transfer of funds to bank accounts of eligible farmers.
contact: Visit the official PM-KISAN website for program information and contact details.

name: Aatmanirbhar Bharat Abhiyan
criteria: Economic relief measures for various sectors including MSMEs and migrant workers.
contact: Check the official government announcements and news releases for details.

name: PM-SVANidhi
criteria: Micro-credit support for street vendors impacted by COVID-19.
contact: Contact your local municipal authorities or visit the PM-SVANidhi website for more information.
